newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-LEEDS CONFIRM INTEREST IN VEGA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LEEDS CONFIRM INTEREST IN VEGA.

text.p: Leeds United manager George Graham has confirmed that he has entered the race to sign Swiss international Ramon Vega from Italian club Cagliari.
The 25-year-old centre-half would cost Graham in excess of three million pounds but the former Arsenal boss said: "We are a long way from any deal.
"I'm interested in any quality players that become available, especially defenders. Vega falls into that category."
Graham is stepping up his search for new players by appointing Ian McNeill as Leeds' new chief scout.
